**Why choose us?**
Top grade quality hardware
99.9% uptime GUARANTEED
Great support.. We speak many languages!
No questions asked, refund.

**All of our VDS packages include..**

Core i7/i5 nodes
Full root access
Quality peering
100mbit uplink
Instant activation - Your vds will be setup instantly after payment.

Flexible month to month payments

**CRAZY SSD DISCOUNTS!**
